title: How to construct the center mass of a circular segment (geometry, circles, geometric construction, math) - Quora

response.answer_text: This is not simple. For ‘correct’ answers to problems like this, first try Google instead of Quora where both people who know and people almost know/think they know will stumble through a presentation. I googled “derivative of a circle” and liked  https://www.math.ucdavis.edu/~kouba/CalcOneDIRECTORY/implicitdiffdirectory/ImplicitDiff.html the best. Shows you 2 ways to do it.
